    • Constructor Detail

      • FilesSetup

        public FilesSetup()

    • Method Detail

      • filesSetup

        static boolean filesSetup()
        Calls individual methods which check for existence of default files. If any of these methods return true, ServerPackCreator will exit, giving the user the chance to customize it before the program runs in production.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if no default file has been generated. False if any default file was generated.

      • checkForConfig

        static boolean checkForConfig()
        Check for old config file, if found rename to new name. If neither old nor new config file can be found, a new config file is generated.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if new config file was generated.

      • checkForFabricLinux

        static boolean checkForFabricLinux()
        Checks for existence of Fabric start script for Linux. If it is not found, it is generated.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the file was generated.

      • checkForFabricWindows

        static boolean checkForFabricWindows()
        Checks for existence of Fabric start script for Windows. If it is not found, it is generated.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the file was generated.

      • checkForForgeLinux

        static boolean checkForForgeLinux()
        Checks for existence of Forge start script for Linux. If it is not found, it is generated.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the file was generated.

      • checkForForgeWindows

        static boolean checkForForgeWindows()
        Checks for existence of Forge start script for Windows. If it is not found, it is generated.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the file was generated.

      • checkForProperties

        static boolean checkForProperties()
        Checks for existence of server.properties file. If it is not found, it is generated.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the file was generated.

      • checkForIcon

        static boolean checkForIcon()
        Checks for existence of server-icon.png file. If it is not found, it is generated.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the file was generated.

      • checkLocaleFile

        public static void checkLocaleFile()

      • writeLocaleToFile

        public static void writeLocaleToFile(java.lang.String locale)

      • writeConfigToFile

        static boolean writeConfigToFile(java.lang.String modpackDir,
                                 java.lang.String clientMods,
                                 java.lang.String copyDirs,
                                 boolean includeServer,
                                 java.lang.String javaPath,
                                 java.lang.String minecraftVersion,
                                 java.lang.String modLoader,
                                 java.lang.String modLoaderVersion,
                                 boolean includeIcon,
                                 boolean includeProperties,
                                 boolean includeScripts,
                                 boolean includeZip)
        Writes a new configuration file with the parameters passed to it.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. The path to the modpack.
        clientMods - List, String. List of clientside-only mods.
        copyDirs - List, String. List of directories to include in server pack.
        includeServer - Boolean. Whether to include a modloader server installation.
        javaPath - String. Path to the java executable.
        minecraftVersion - String. Minecraft version used by the modpack and server pack.
        modLoader - String. Modloader used by the modpack and server pack. Ether Forge or Fabric.
        modLoaderVersion - String. Modloader version used by the modpack and server pack.
        includeIcon - Boolean. Whether to include a server-icon in the server pack.
        includeProperties - Boolean. Whether to include a properties file in the server pack.
        includeScripts - Boolean. Whether to include start scripts in the server pack.
        includeZip - Boolean. Whether to create a ZIP-archive of the server pack, excluding Mojang's Minecraft server jar.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the configuration file has been successfully written and old ones replaced.
